data.name: labelStyleSet.Help
data.value: Style set name for MiniGallery elements

data.name: labelMaxHeight.Help
data.value: Maximum height of a module, used to define scrollbars appearance, in pixels. Set this to negative value or leave empty to disable.

data.name: labelTarget.Help
data.value: Set link target. Has no meaning for jQuery image viewer, but may be useful without it.

data.name: labelUseLightbox.Help
data.value: Check to use Lightbox-like viewer / image gallery jQuery module.

data.name: labelUseScrollbar.Help
data.value: Check to use jQuery scrollbar module.

data.name: labelUseImageHandler.Help
data.value: Check to use external image handler to create thumbnails. Only R7.ImageHandler is supported at this time.

data.name: labelImageHandlerParams.Help
data.value: Add URL parameter string which will be added to image handler URL if name-value pairs format, or leave empty to use default URL. Supported tags: {fileticket}, {fileid}, {width}, {height}.

data.name: labelShowTitles.Help
data.value: If checked, images title is displayed

data.name: labelExpand.Help
data.value: If checked, each column width are calculated as 100% / number of columns approximately. This setting only effective if a columns number is specified explicitly (not auto).

data.name: labelTextBefore.Help
data.value: Enter HTML to be placed before (above) image list. This property overrides Header value from Module Settings / Advanced tab.

data.name: labelTextAfter.Help
data.value: Enter HTML to be placed after (below) image list. This property overrides Footer value from Module Settings / Advanced tab.

data.name: labelColumns.Help
data.value: Set number of columns in the image list. If columns set to auto, all available width will be taken by images.

data.name: labelImageWidth.Help
data.value: Specify width of the displayed image in any CSS units, except percents (%). If not set, thumbnail width or original image width will be used.

data.name: labelImageHeight.Help
data.value: Specify height of the displayed image in any CSS units, except percents (%). If not set, thumbnail height or original image height will be used.

data.name: labelThumbWidth.Help
data.value: Specify thumbnail image width in px. Leave empty or set to zero or negative value to disable.

data.name: labelThumbHeight.Help
data.value: Specify thumbnail image width in px. Leave empty or set to zero or negative value to disable.

data.name: labelNumberOfRecords.Help
data.value: Enter the number of records to show or leave empty to show it all.

data.name: labelNumberOfRecords.Help
data.value: Check if image list should be sorted by SortIndex ascending.
